parsed_action.reasoning: With no recent events and no demand data, implement small, inventory-aware price tests. Increase Home Goods (+10%) to protect lower stock (40) and margin; slight increase Electronics (+5%) with moderate stock (50); decrease Apparel (-5%) to accelerate sell-through on highest stock (60). This staggered adjustment probes price elasticity while managing inventory risk, keeping prices well above cost basis.
